Per his attorney, Alex Jones WILL testify tomorrow, as a witness for his own defense, in the defamation case brought by the parents of Sandy Hook victims. 
I'm not surprised. Will it be a spectacle? Could be. I think not. More likely he'll try for a Hail Mary.

Lewis: “Having a son shot in his 1st grade classroom is unbearable. You don't think you're going to survive. Having someone on top of that say it was a hoax. You think I'm an actress?”

Alex Jones: “I don’t think you’re an actress”

Judge: “You’re not allowed to talk right now.”
Today is the day the Sandy Hook victims are testifying in Alex Jones’s trial. Alex didn’t show for court. So I checked to see what he is doing right now. This is a live shot. https://t.co/iqsSRHswKa

Sandy Hook parent Scarlett Lewis is directly speaking to Alex Jones, who is now in the courtroom, as she testifies on the stand.  

"Jesse was real," Lewis tells Jones. "I am a real mom." 

She says she wanted to tell Jones this to his face.
